long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Attackpoint Enhancement Suite enhances your Attackpoint browsing experience. 

Features:
- Tag users (e.g., tag "bob" with "mapping geek" )
- Open all unread favorites in new tabs
- "Magic paste" of DOMA map urls into a thumbnail image that links back to the map
- Track your log for new comments (badge appears on the extension icon)
- Don't like what someone has to say? Chickenify all their comments 

Changelog:
Version 0.30 works with https attackpoint
